shortDescription: We have decided to use the Yurei's advanced maneuverability to destroy the Local Government's leadership. I hope that this is within your abilities commander.
longDescription: Well, I guess that makes sense.

contractObjectiveList.title: Destroy Local Government Leadership and Escape
contractObjectiveList.description: Destroy the Target, clear area of additional Enemies, and Escape

objectiveList.title: Destroy the Supporting Forces
objectiveList.description: The secondary objective to destroy an additional lance supporting the assassination target.

objectiveList.title: Destroy the Leader of the Local Government
objectiveList.description: The objective to destroy the Assassination Target.

objectiveList.title: Destroy Assassination Lance Hidden Objective
objectiveList.description: Hidden Objective for AutoComplete, Destroy Assassination Lance

objectiveList.title: Get to the Evac Zone
objectiveList.description: The objective for the player to escape and complete the mission.

objectiveList.title: Prevent the Target from Escaping
objectiveList.description: The objective to stop the assassination target for escaping, the player will fail if the target escapes.

objectiveList.title: Armor Breached
objectiveList.description: Armor of the Target is breached.

dialogueContent.words: Commander, we're receiving a transmission from Duchess.
I see him up there. I bet he thinks he can drive us off planet.
Don't let him out of this alive Commander.
You performed within specifications of the mission. I will brief you on the Argo
Abject Failure, And I don't mean the Yurei.
The Local Leader has perished. A Leopard is on standby for pickup.
Readings indicate the ambushing units are out of commission. The employer will be pleased.
That is our target, sustain fire on that unit!
Sensors are showing enemy movement beyond our initial count. Be advised you might meet with increased resistance.
Commander, the target is bugging out! Eliminate them before they escape.
